CREATOR - Static variable in class uk.rib.armouryoftheguardian.WeaponStatistics
Classes implementing the Parcelable interface must also have a non-null static field called CREATOR of a type that implements the Parcelable.Creator interface.

Weapon - Class in uk.rib.armouryoftheguardian
This is for the weapon screen and gets the end user's selected weapon's name, picture, definition, statistics, and potential perks.
Weapon(Parcel) - Constructor for class uk.rib.armouryoftheguardian.Weapon
This gets all weapon info from the parcel, which includes: The definition of the weapon The weapon's weapon_image_icon The weapon's statistics, like its damage, range, stability, and so forth The perks the weapon can use
